Html:
Something happened with Rawr today. When I opened it, all the options to use jewelcrafter bop gems (Dragon's Eye gems) have dissappeared. I cannot equip or add gemming using Dragon's Eye Gems. They do not show on the list. The items I have equipped still have the gems in them though, so I know the program can see them.
I re loaded the program.............Nothing.
I re downloaded the program and reloaded again...........Nothing.

Where did those gems go?

Also, I see that even if I reload the program, it somehow retains old information. Somehow it still sees the options to reload my saved character files, which means there is some file somewhere with the corrupted information that it still keeps checking for. I need to delete that file too, but dont know what it is.
Look in the top right corner and enable jewelcrafting from the Filter drop down.
Thank you!! Its always something so simple.
